mapper.select: select etclogtime, sum(hithit) as hithit, sum(likelike) as likelike, sum(shareshare) as shareshare from etctest where seq=#{seq} and etclogtime >= to_char(sysdate-5, 'YY/MM/DD') and etclogtime <= to_char(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD') group by etclogtime order by etclogtime asc

select b.dt+1 as dt, nvl(sum(a.cnt), 0) cnt from (select signlogtime, count(signlogtime) as cnt from simrimember where signlogtime >= to_char(sysdate-6, 'YY/MM/DD') and signlogtime <= to_char(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD') group by signlogtime )a, (select to_date(to_char(sysdate-6, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YY/MM/DD') + LEVEL-1 as dt from dual connect by level <= (sysdate - (sysdate-6)+1) )b where b.dt = a.signlogtime(+) group by b.dt, signlogtime order by b.dt

SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YY/MM') as dtmonth, NVL(SUM(a.cnt), 0) cnt from (select signlogtime, count(signlogtime) as cnt from simrimember group by signlogtime ) a , (select to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yy')||'/01/01', 'yy/mm/dd') + level -1 as dt from dual connect by level <=(TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate, 'yy')||'/12/31','yy/mm/dd') - TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate, 'yy')||'/01/01','yy/mm/dd') + 1) )b WHERE b.dt = a.signlogtime(+) group by TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YY/MM') order by 1
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.*from (select * from community where category='심리 테스트' order by hit desc)tt )where rn between 1 and 3
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.*from (select * from community where category='연애 심리글' order by hit desc)tt )where rn between 1 and 3
select * from community where category in ('심리 테스트', '연애 심리글') and comlogtime like TO_DATE(to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')) order by ${condition} desc
select * from community where category in ('심리 테스트', '연애 심리글') and to_char(comlogtime, 'yy/mm/dd') between to_char(sysdate-6, 'yy/mm/dd') and to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') order by ${condition} desc
select * from community where category in ('심리 테스트', '연애 심리글') and to_char(comlogtime, 'yy/mm/dd') between to_char(sysdate-30, 'yy/mm/dd') and to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') order by ${condition} desc
